Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Coney Island in 1972...
Had first career hit on 9/13/1973, off Toney Powell (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/15/1973, off David Hans (Ash)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1974, hitting .271 with 23 HR, 85 RBI...
Injured on 6/25/1976 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1978, hitting .478 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1979, hitting .565 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1979, hitting .376 with 9 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1979, hitting .457 with 4 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1979, hitting .316 with 33 HR, 120 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Boston (UBA), driving in 3 runs on 4/23/1980...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 7/15/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1980, hitting .348 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1980, hitting .284 with 9 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Traded from Coney Island to West Texas on 2/12/1982 (Going to CI: C H. Prouty, LF A. Mejorado. Going to WT: 1B W. Tiller)...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 4/14/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1982, hitting .519 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Syracuse on 5/4/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1983, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Ashburn on 8/14/1983...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/13/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $10,500,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Ashburn on 4/17/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1984, hitting .483 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Lynchburg on 9/18/1985...
Drove in 6 runs against West Texas on 5/16/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1986, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/19/1986, off James Carnell (CC)...
